example_en: Trust is the foundation of friendship.
Loyalty is important in any relationship.
A good companion makes the journey better.
We had a small gathering at home.
Friends sometimes argue but make up.
My colleague helped me with the project.
He is just an acquaintance, not a close friend.
example_ka: ის მხოლოდ ნაცნობია, არა ახლო მეგობარი.

example_en: She gave me a warm hug.
Let me introduce you to my friend.
She comforted me when I was sad.
She volunteers at a community center.
Conflict can be resolved through dialogue.
Everyone wants to feel they belong.
example_ka: ყველას სურს იგრძნოს, რომ სადღაც მიეკუთვნება.

example_en: Loneliness can be overcome with good friends.
She shows great affection for her friends.
example_ka: ის დიდ სიყვარულს გამოავლენს მეგობრების მიმართ.

example_en: There's strong fellowship among the group.
They showed solidarity during the crisis.
The camaraderie was evident among teammates.
He pledged his allegiance to the group.
Her devotion to friends is admirable.
Good manners are important in friendship.
I feel kinship with my colleagues.
I have good memories with friends.
I feel nostalgia for my childhood friends.
Your friendship is precious to me.
Friendship is more valuable than gold.
You're a special friend to me.
I had a wonderful time with friends.
We had a fantastic evening together.
Nobody is perfect, but friends accept us.
example_ka: არავინ არის სრულყოფილი, მაგრამ მეგობრები გვიღებენ.

example_en: Spending time with friends is uplifting.
Good friends are observant of changes.
He has intuitive understanding of friendship.
He's jovial and fun to be around.
example_ka: ის მხიარულია და მასთან ყოფნა სასიამოვნოა.

example_en: The party was lively and fun.
Their animated conversation continued for hours.
She gave a spirited defense of her friend.
Their friendship has a dynamic quality.
She brings vibrant energy to friendships.
He's a charismatic leader among friends.
We had a memorable time together.
Some encounters are fleeting but meaningful.
Our meeting was brief but pleasant.
example_ka: ჩვენი შეხვედრა მოკლე, მაგრამ სასიამოვნო იყო.
